annonsrubrik: We are looking for a Managing Director for one of our clients
annonstext:
On behalf of our client, Global Nordics is looking for a Managing Director with high business acumen to join and lead our client`s Stockholm office which services international clients who wish to set up or expand their business operations in Sweden, Finland, and Norway. 

You will be responsible for Nordic Entity Management services in Sweden, Finland, and Norway by managing and maintaining entities across borders.

In the position you will be responsible for:

Planning and implementing long-term business strategies 

Budget and organization development

Managing overall financial performance and building the local team 

Looking for opportunities to increase efficiencies and speed up processes across the business for winning new business. 

Analysing opportunities for growth in the market segments to drive profitability.

Manging and maintaining client entities in the Nordics 

Ensuring and monitoring compliance with applicable provisions of law and generally accepted practice in the company's operations and management

Overseeing day-to-day operations in Sweden, Finland, and Norway

Providing solutions to operational issues as they arise

Supporting Group operations as necessary

Your profile:

An entrepreneurial spirit and ambition to run a business without supervision

Can demonstrate a track record of developing and successfully executing revenue growth plans

Strong self-drive and goal-focused

Passion for growth

Problem-solving aptitude

Communicative, the ability to be a clear communicator and represent the company in the industry and in general 

With strong insights into the industry market as well as an in-depth network of the market

A natural leader and motivator of people

Ability to perform and work under tight schedules and high pressure

Excellent of both spoken and written Swedish and English. Any other language is a bonus

BSc/BA in Business or Law; MBA/LLM is a plus

Please contact us for more information at  EMAIL
